title: Create hello world component
description: Build Angular hello world component displaying 'Hello World' text in red. Include logout button and user info display. Add styling for the red text.
notes:
COMPLETED - Hello World component fully functional:
- Displays 'Hello World' in large red text (4rem, #ef4444)
- Shows user welcome message and current user details
- Logout button in header for session termination
- Professional gradient UI (purple to violet) with white card
- Responsive design for mobile devices (2.5rem heading on mobile)
- User info displayed: username and email from auth service
- Integrated with AuthService for secure user data
- All files created and committed
- Angular app compiling successfully without errors

title: Create authentication service
description: Create Angular authentication service for managing login, logout, registration, and session state. Integrate with localStorage or cookies for session persistence.
notes:
Enhanced auth service with:
- User and AuthResponse interfaces for type safety
- currentUser$ BehaviorSubject for reactive user state
- getCurrentUser() and getToken() methods
- Comprehensive error handling
- Session restoration on service init
- API_URL constant and TODO comments marking integration points
- All components fully integrated and compiling

Ready for HTTP interceptor setup (test-zwu) when backend is ready.

title: Set up Angular routing and route guards
description: Create Angular routing module. Set up routes for login, registration, hello world, and password recovery pages. Implement route guards for protected pages.
notes:
✓ COMPLETED - Created routing configuration with:
- app.routes.ts with routes for login, register, hello, recovery, and password reset
- authGuard for protecting authenticated pages  
- loginGuard to prevent authenticated users from accessing login/register
- AuthService with mock implementation for login, register, logout, password recovery
- All routes configured with lazy loading for better performance
- Error handling and proper redirects in place

title: Create registration component
description: Build Angular registration component with form validation for username, email, and password strength. Implement submission to authentication service.
notes:
✓ COMPLETED - Registration component fully functional:
- Form with username, email, password, and confirm password fields
- Email format validation
- Password strength indicator with color coding (Weak to Very Strong)
- Password match validation with custom validator
- Username minimum 3 characters
- Password minimum 6 characters
- Professional UI matching login component
- Responsive design
- Links to login page
- Integrated with AuthService
